summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5819 for the improvement of 47th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to Sand Point Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76668 as amended by Ordinance No. 76850, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
